thread.section_title: Maison Athenee - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Compact and bijoux hotel
thread.title_full: Compact and bijoux hotel - Review of Maison Athenee, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gourmetgourmande3005
title: Compact and bijoux hotel
text: Maison Athenee is small but does the job perfectly. The staff were very charming, courteous and efficient. Located right next to l'Opera it was ideal for getting around and great links to RER which made it straightforward getting to airports. Also great as it is a short walk to the Louvre, Jeu de Paume and Les Tuileries. It is not the kind of place to hang out though as it has few amenities but lovely for what it does offer and overall it was a great little hotel to use as a base.
